title: How do I make sure this is the right content?
excerpt: Check the title, author name, or ISBN. You can also read the overview and look
content:
Check the title, author name, or ISBN. You can also read the overview and look at the table of contents.

Important: Make sure the content is correct before selecting it. Otherwise, you'll have to start again from your course. To look for different content, enter search terms in the box at the top of the page.
